column4: do somebody know the preparations of working wireless with an acer aspire 1500
I can't get a wireless internet connection on my laptop for 7 days can please somebody help me it is with a wep key
please can somebdy help me with wireless internet on my laptop
please
what's the issue?|
do you have Ubuntu installed on it?
and which wireless chipset is it?
I realize that, but your laptop has a wireless chipset.
that's the spec. I need the actual hardware name.
in lspci -v
don't paste here
I need the wireless chipset information
no, look for something along the lines of "Network controller"
i have it here Network controller: Broadcom Corporation BCM4306 802.11b/g Wireless LAN Controller (rev 03)
do you know what to do next
use ndiswrapper
i have installed ndiswrapper
so now use it, ndiswrapper -i /path/to/inf/file
which driver must i install the  bcml driver
use the .inf file
how to login as root
use sudo
